import React from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import {getCategories} from '../../actions/categoryAction' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class TopProductsShow extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { productID :'' } } componentDidMount = ()=>{ this.props.dispatch(getCategories()) const refersh = setInterval( () =>{ if( this.props.categories.length ) { clearInterval(refersh) const id = this.props.categories.filter(category =>{ return category.subType.filter(type =>{ console.log(type) return type.name === this.props.productType ? type._id :'' }) }) console.log(id,'Top mene') } },1000) } render() { console.log(this.props.productType,'Top display') return(

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) =>{ return { categories:state.categories } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(TopProductsShow)
